name: generate_spreadsheet
description: Generate a spreadsheet or pivot table for displaying tabular data. When 'rows' or 'values' fields are provided, it renders as a pivot table (cross-tabulation); otherwise, it renders as a regular table. Useful for displaying structured data, comparing values across categories, and creating data summaries.

data.description: Data for spreadsheet, an array of objects where each object represents a row. Keys are column names and values can be string, number, null, or undefined. Such as, [{ name: 'John', age: 30 }, { name: 'Jane', age: 25 }].

rows.description: Row header fields for pivot table. When 'rows' or 'values' is provided, the spreadsheet will be rendered as a pivot table.

columns.description: Column header fields, used to specify the order of columns. For regular tables, this determines column order; for pivot tables, this is used for column grouping.

values.description: Value fields for pivot table. When 'rows' or 'values' is provided, the spreadsheet will be rendered as a pivot table.

theme.description: Set the theme for the spreadsheet, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
